channel.title: (not) Bringing Blankification Back
channel.description:
I actually rediscovered [a pretty good justification for voidification](https://forum.rebol.info/t/void-and-the-end-of-blankification/704), which I had written up and forgotten about.
The key is to avoid casual errors with transformations of IF...ELSE to EITHER and back.
So blankification is *not* coming back. Disregard! :see_no_evil:
